meanings.definition: Attractive in a delicate way without being truly beautiful or handsome.
meanings.sent1: The flowers in the garden were pretty with their soft colors.
meanings.sent2: She wore a pretty dress to the party.
meanings.sent3: The cat looked pretty funny wearing a tiny hat.
meanings.sent4: The sunset painted the sky in pretty hues of pink and orange.
meanings.sent5: The little girl's laughter was as pretty as a melody.

meanings.sent1: The view from the top of the hill was pretty with all the trees below.
meanings.sent2: The garden was filled with pretty flowers of all colors.
meanings.sent3: The puppy's attempt to catch its tail was pretty amusing.
meanings.sent4: The city lights at night created a pretty sight from afar.
meanings.sent5: The old house had a pretty charm that drew visitors in.

meanings.sent1: The cake was pretty big, enough to feed the whole party.
meanings.sent2: The dog was pretty large compared to the other puppies.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel found a pretty large acorn to nibble on.
meanings.sent4: The mountain loomed pretty large in the distance.
meanings.sent5: The truck parked outside was pretty massive, taking up two spaces.
